name: Rapid-Prototypes From 2016
description:
This is the first time I've officially uploaded a project in WebGL. If there're any issues, please post a comment.
If your browser has an issue with the Final Game; enter full-screen mode.

This is a collection of old rapid-prototypes I did back in 2016 for TAFE.

There are bugs and issues; I don't really have a plan to fix them, since it isn't the purpose of this little project.

I know the mouse sensitivity for the final game is really high. 
This is due to the canvas being a low resolution WebGL canvas; I would fix it if I could, but I really don't have the energy right now to do a fix.
